name: Save the Snowman
description:
This is my demo project Save the Snowman.

Players goal in this game is to find a way to the fridge and save snowman from daylight and melting.

Controls: WASD

Currently there are 7 levels, once you finish last level the game will loop back to level 1. You can exit to main menu using Num Enter key.

Demo is free, if you don't want to donate just click "No thanks, just take me to the downloads" when prompted.
